R

randomImg(ActionEvent) - Method in class ui.PaintController
This method uses the binary tree from the model package to select a random node (image) from it, then an image from the ui/img package is selected and displayed in the canvas.
refreshIcons() - Method in class ui.PrimaryStageController
This method refresh all the icons when another song is picked from the music folder.
refreshPlayerBackground() - Method in class ui.PrimaryStageController
This method refresh the player background when another song is picked from the music folder.
removeMusicFolderFromLibraries(MusicFolder) - Method in class model.musicPlayer.MusicPlayer
This method allows to remove a music folder from the linked list.
restartThreads() - Method in class ui.PrimaryStageController
This method restarts the cover art animation when the song is changed or the player changes from pause to play.
right - Variable in class model.musicPlayer.Song
It represents the right Song of this Song in the binary search three.
right - Variable in class model.paint.ImageOnTree
 
root - Variable in class model.musicPlayer.MusicFolder
This is the song that charges all the other songs in the binary search tree
root - Variable in class model.paint.TreeOfImages
 
run() - Method in class threads.CoverArtAnimationThread
This method allows to run the circle animation when the song is not paused.
run() - Method in class threads.CurrentTrackTimeUpdaterThread
This method allows to run and update the song time duration when a song is selected and played.
